Text: KBC congratulates  News Anchor and Reporter Ms. @purity_museo for being recognized by #PresUhuruKenyatta for outstanding service to the nation during #Covid19 pandemic. Keep it up...👏👏👏 #UzalendoAward #KBCfamilyMatters @KBCChannel1 https://t.co/QWtmfyRah8

The Presidential Task Force on COVID-19 has reduced the nationwide curfew from 10pm to 4am effective from tomorrow, Tuesday, June 2. They want to put us on proper In Sha Allah ; In Sha Jesus autopilot. Use your sense, avoid gallivanting around. Covid19 doesn't GAF about time
China has stopped purchasing soy and pork moments ago, putting even more pressure on the Trump regime and US farmers who mostly voted on Trump 4 years ago.Impeccable timing.https://t.co/LXm71s6Dum

I'm in touch with someone who's on the governors' call with President Trump right now. They and others listening in are alarmed. The president is urging governors to take back the streets, not be "weak," and use force as the nation faces growing racial unrest.
Trump recommends using more force -- in wake of abuse of force. He berates governors as ‘weak' in handling of George Floyd protests, urges them to get tougher.  https://t.co/BVi8JiDe6M
@jackhutton @maggieNYT @jack:  Would it be a violation of Twitter rules if it were proven that someone besides Trump is using his account to Tweet?

Like all other strong men, Donald Trump is a coward and soft and terrified. Hiding in the White House and turning off the lights is all on brand. These are insecure, sad little men who build themselves up with the iconography of fascism to hide their fear.
UPDATE: As of today, the cumulative number of confirmed #COVID19 cases is 34 357, the total number of deaths to 705 and total recoveries are now updated to 17291. https://t.co/5nYbl9IonH

JUST IN: President Trump unloads on the nation's governors on a call, calls on them to step up enforcement: "You have to dominate, if you don't dominate you're wasting your time. They're going to run over you, you're going to look like a bunch of jerks. You have to dominate."
